set_time.description: Set the time on the clock by rotating the hands.

clean_hand_post_rotation.description: Clean the clock hand after adjusting the time.

full_service_on_hand.description: Adjust the time and then clean the hand.

rotate_hand_anticlockster.description: Rotate the hand anticlockwise to set the time backwards.

rotate_clock_hand.description: Rotate the hands of the clock.

clean_previous_rotated_hand.description: Clean the hand after it's been rotated.

rotate_hand_clockwise.description: Rotate the hand of the clock clockwise to adjust the time.

rotate_hand_anticlockwise.description: Rotate the hand of the clock anticlockwise to adjust the time.

clean_hand.description: Clean the hand of the clock to keep it dust free.

adjust_wipe_hand.description: Adjust the time and clean the hand zippily.

adjust_time.description: Adjust the time by rotating the hand.

rotate_hand.description: Rotate the hand of the clock to adjust the time.

rotate_hand_smoothly.description: Rotate the hands of the clock smoothly.

wipe_clean_hand.description: Wipe clean the hand of the clock after it has been rotated.

rotate_hand_to_noon.description: Rotate the hand of the clock to the noon position.

rotate_hand_to_midnight.description: Rotate the hand of the clock to the midnight position.

clean_hand_thoroughly.description: Thoroughly clean the hand of the clock.

clean_adjust_hand_quickly.description: Quickly adjust the time and clean the hand.

rotate_hand_precisely.description: Rotate the hand of the clock precisely to set the accurate time.

dust_removal_from_body.description: Remove dust from the clock body.

dual_clean_clock_body.description: Double clean the clock body for absolute cleaning.

all_clean_clock_body.description: Clean the entire clock body along with hands.

clean_clock_body.description: Wipe the body of the clock clean.

clean_whole_clock.description: Clean the entire clock including the clock body and hands.

clean_clock_body_once.description: Clean the external body of the clock to make it dust-free.

clean_clock_body_twice.description: Perform double cleaning on the external body of the clock to ensure perfect cleaning.

polish_clock_body.description: Polish the body of the clock clean.

wipe_clean_entire_clock.description: Wipe clean the entire clock including the clock body and the hands.

repeat_cleaning_clock_body.description: Repeat the cleaning of the external body of the clock to ensure it is dust-free.

time_adjust_and_clean.description: Time adjustment and cleaning of the entire clock.

clock_full_service.description: The whole maintenance process which includes clock cleaning and time adjustment.

rotation_cleaning_cycle.description: First rotate the hands to adjust the timing and then clean the entire clock.

full_scale_service.description: Cleaning the clock, rotating the hands to adjust time and finally again cleaning for an overall upkeep of the clock.

rotate_and_wipe_clean.description: Rotate the clock hands and then clean the entire clock.

clean_and_adjust_time.description: Perform a thorough clean before adjusting the clock's time.

full_clock_maintenance.description: Perform a complete maintenance of the clock including cleaning and time adjustment.

rotate_hand_and_clean.description: Rotate the hand of the clock first and then perform cleaning.

clean_and_rotate_hand.description: Clean the clock first and then rotate the hand to adjust the time.

full_service.description: Clean the clock, adjust the time and again clean the clock for a comprehensive upkeep.

clean_adjust_whole_clock.description: Clean and adjust time in the entire clock including its body and hands.

rotate_wipe_clock.description: Rotate the clock's hand then clean the hand and body.

clean_whole_clock.description: Clean the entire clock including the body and clock hands.

adjust_and_clean.description: First adjust the time by rotating the hands, then clean the entire clock

rotate_clean_setup.description: Rotate the clock hands and then clean the entire clock for a setup.

clean_adjust_finalize.description: Perform a thorough cleaning before adjusting the clock's time for finalizing the setup.

full_clock_overhaul.description: Perform a complete overhaul of the clock including cleaning and time adjustment.

rotate_hand_clean_completion.description: Rotate the hand of the clock first and then perform cleaning for completion.

clean_rotate_finalize.description: Clean the clock first and then rotate the hand to adjust the time and finalize the setup.

clean_rotate_complete_maintenance.description: First, clean the clock. Then, adjust the time and clean the clock again for a complete maintenance.

rotate_clean_whole_clock.description: Rotate the clock's hand then clean the hand and body of the clock.

clean_adjust_time_entire_clock.description: First, adjust the time by rotating the hands, followed by cleaning the entire clock.
